com.ragego.engine

Interface TurnListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GameListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTurnListener, ConsoleMain, GraphicTurnListener, RemotePlayerListener, ScoreCounter

    public interface TurnListener
    Listen to know when to play.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endOfTurn(GameBoard board, Player player, Player nextPlayer)
      Run an ends of turn.
      void newTurn(GameBoard board, Player player)
      Run app_logic for this turn.
      void startOfTurn(GameBoard board, Player player, Player previousPlayer)
      Run a start of turn.

    • Method Detail

      • newTurn

        void newTurn(GameBoard board,
             Player player)
        Run app_logic for this turn. When game engine end to call each turn listener, the turn is ended.
        Parameters:
        board - The board on which we are playing
        player - The player who have to play

      • endOfTurn

        void endOfTurn(GameBoard board,
               Player player,
               Player nextPlayer)
        Run an ends of turn. This function is call at an end of turn. We suppose that you won't edit the game. Score and state are already computed.
        Parameters:
        board - The board on which we are playing
        player - The player who has played
        nextPlayer - The player who will play

      • startOfTurn

        void startOfTurn(GameBoard board,
                 Player player,
                 Player previousPlayer)
        Run a start of turn. This function is call at an end of turn. We suppose that you won't edit the game. Score and state are already computed.
        Parameters:
        board - The board on which we are playing
        player - The player who will played
        previousPlayer - The player who has played
